main event: A reddish orange fireball was reported in Boise, Idaho, identified as a large marine flare.
interesting points: The fireball was first reported by Boise TV stations and described as descending slowly on a twelve-foot parachute., Multiple witnesses, including the sheriff of Boise, confirmed seeing two large red objects that appeared to land., The objects reportedly shot flames downward as they descended., A news reporter revealed that an unidentified man had set off the flare to demonstrate a new invention., Due to the explanation provided, the investigation into the sighting was suspended.
witness description: reliable witnesses, including the sheriff of Boise
